# insta-mockup Development Guidelines

Auto-generated from all feature plans. Last updated: 2025-12-21

## Active Technologies
- Python 3.13 (backend) + TypeScript/React (frontend) + FastAPI, SQLModel, Starlette SessionMiddleware (backend); React/Vite, Wouter, TanStack Query, shadcn/ui components (frontend) (001-instagram-mockup-feed)
- SQLite by default via `DATABASE_URL`; file storage under `UPLOAD_DIR` served at `/media` (001-instagram-mockup-feed)
- Python 3.11 (backend), TypeScript/React (frontend) (001-instagram-mockup-feed)
- SQLModel DB (SQLite default, Postgres supported via `DATABASE_URL`), filesystem for uploads in `UPLOAD_DIR` served at `/media` (001-instagram-mockup-feed)

- (001-instagram-mockup-feed)
